text_cards.caption: LOW ENERGY STATE
text_cards.description: Non-designated cows move only 1 hex at a time.

text_cards.caption: TARGET ORBITALS
text_cards.description: Cows may also orbit target hexes.

text_cards.caption: EMERGENCY BRAKE
text_cards.description: Cows may stop anywhere, but cannot move again afterwards.

text_cards.caption: FORCE FIELD
text_cards.description: Cows may turn their surrounding hexes into blockades.

text_cards.caption: INELASTIC COLLISION
text_cards.description: A cow may push another cow any number of hexes before stopping.

text_cards.caption: QUANTUM TUNNELING
text_cards.description: A cow may move through one blockade and continue moving in the same direction.

text_cards.caption: SINGLE INSTRUCTION, MULTIPLE DATA
text_cards.description: The same movement instruction may be given to multiple cows at the same time.

text_cards.caption: TARGET TURNER
text_cards.description: Any number of targets may be rotated to a new position for a turn.

text_cards.caption: PARTICLE WAVE DUALITY
text_cards.description: A cow may stop if any of the side diagonals are blocked.

text_cards.caption: TELEPORT
text_cards.description: Non-designated cows may use a move to telport from one target to another.

text_cards.caption: SLOWER SPEED OF LIGHT
text_cards.description: Before each turn, one chosen cow moves 1 hex in a set direction. Other cows may interact with it during their moves.

text_cards.caption: SPACE CURVATURE
text_cards.description: Outer walls are removed. Cows moving into a wall wrap to the opposite side of the board and continue moving.

text_cards.caption: ACTION AT A DISTANCE
text_cards.description: Non-designated cows may stop one hex short of a blocking hex.

text_cards.caption: ELASTIC COLLISION
text_cards.description: After a cow collision, the stationary cow moves in the same direction that is was pushed as part of the same move.

text_cards.caption: ENTANGLEMENT
text_cards.description: Adjacent cows may swap places and/or move together as an entangled pair.
